entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Preview 7 #321
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38168 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #320
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38167 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #319
  • .NET August 2024 Updates #318

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Implement drawing API #106373
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'unreached' during `Importation` #106372
    9.0.0
  • System.Threading.ThreadPool.Tests fail in CI with System.Net.Sockets.SocketException #106371
  • Using Options Validation Source Generator results in increased app size #106366
    Future
  • [ARM64] Post-indexed addressing mode does not work on spans #106365
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38167 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #106359
  • JIT: Wrong encoding for embedded broadcast #106355
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with ulong -> float conversion on arm64 #106338
    9.0.0
  • Tracking: Add Azure Linux for build and test #106331
  • WebClient() Removal Timeline #106325
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Unit.Tests.HPack.HuffmanDecodingTests.HuffmanDecoding_ValidEncoding_Succeeds on WASM #106323
  • Httpclient throwing Response ended Prematurely #106322
  • System.Runtime.Tests.WorkItemExecution "crash" on tvOS #106319
  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #106342
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Cache #106346
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions on Multiple platforms, 8/8/2024 11:52:00 PM #106345
  • Mono Runtime crash when debug evaluating/inspecting/monitor member #106311
    9.0.0
  • Wasm export functions with name space cannot be invoked correctly? #106310
  • The .NET 8 executable behaves differently from the .NET 6 executable on Linux. #106306

Closed

  • ARM-SVE: AddSequentialAcross() is defined incorrectly #106180
    9.0.0
  • Unify type name parser in linker once is in runtime #77868
    9.0.0
  • Documentation status of _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88805
    9.0.0
  • Compiling against methods that accept params span with only System.Runtime reference produces compiler error #102513
    9.0.0
  • Installation of .NET 8.0+ disables mouse #103343
  • Applications requesting download of .NET 8 runtime even when it is installed #105615
  • CI failure RegularExpressions didn't throw expected TimeoutException #106096
    9.0.0
  • Build FAILED after #106209 PR (Implement type name resolution for ILLink analyzer) #106321
  • SettingsProperty constructor ignores serializeAs parameter if it is not SettingsSerializeAs.Binary #104732
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] EventSource_SendingRequest_PathAndQueryRedaction_LogsStartStop #106268
  • Calling a CsWinRT NAOT dll's DllCanUnloadNow export triggers CFG failure #105330
    9.0.0
  • TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer failed in CI #103459
    9.0.0
  • Host Feature request: Enable FDD apps to always get the globally installed runtime #86801
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38168 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #106361
  • ILVerify complains about conversion from `string[]` to `IList<object>` #106282
  • System.Linq.Expressions almost completely lacks support for ByRef values #84173
  • Performance issue occurs while using DynamicInvoke #88469
  • FATAL UNHANDLED EXCEPTION: System.InvalidOperationException: JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled in .NET for Android #106339
  • `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests.WorkItemExecution` fails with access violation #105704
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #100051
    9.0.0
  • Expression.Lambda() performance degradation and system outage with over 16 arguments #97466
  • EnsureInitialized test crash on llvm19/iOS #105251
    9.0.0
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Logging] Bug: Logging arrays is broken and behaves unreliably #103338
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) && "ERROR: Did not morph this node!"' during 'Morph - Global' #106278
    9.0.0
  • FATAL UNHANDLED EXCEPTION: System.InvalidOperationException: JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled in .NET for Android #106315
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_SSE41)' #106143
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!foundMismatch' during 'LSRA allocate' #66580
    9.0.0
  • Double check failing `allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema` EE calls #101711
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: ConditionalSelect(LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtend*) codegen #102904
    9.0.0
  • Swedish characters bug in terminal with .Net 7 #92009
    9.0.0
  • [mono] macOS interpreter failure in GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950/452950/452950.sh #105933
  • Please introduce pauseless GC in c# #49059
    Future
  • [browser][MT] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.WorkItemExecution timeout #102385
    9.0.0
  • Reading JsonNode Property Throws 'Nullable object must have a value' on first access #106298
  • [Test Failure] iOS.Device.ExportManagedSymbols times out #106318
  • [NativeAOT] string[] not assignable to IList<object> #106297
  • [wasi] Native link produces `dotnet.wasm` in project folder and then it copies it to output folder #100863
    9.0.0
  • .net 8 Blazor WASM project AOT fails #99548
    9.0.0
  • CI test failure: Connection handshake was canceled due to the configured timeout #99074
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Intrinsics/MathFusedMultiplyAdd_ro/MathFusedMultiplyAdd_ro.cmd #106244
  • Test failure: GC/API/GC/GetTotalAllocatedBytes/GetTotalAllocatedBytes.sh #106305
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/xxobj/sizeof/sizeof32_Target_64Bit_and_arm_d/sizeof32_Target_64Bit_and_arm_d.cmd #106307
  • Is there a way to modify the file properties of the exe generated after .NET compilation? #106127
  • iOS, .NET 9 Preview 7, AOT compiler failure #106137
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorSpanTests test failure #103525
    9.0.0
  • P99 Latency for .net 8 services increased > 10x #101746
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 2 Regressions on 12/5/2023 8:53:15 AM #96499
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fixes #106142. #106369
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add NegotiatedCipherSuite to QuicConnection #106368
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix logging formatting #106367
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.x
  • Fix issue 105966. #106364
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump Windows MsQuic version to 2.4.3 #106363
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add missing delegating/override method in TlsStream #106362
    area-System.Net
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetPEFileName in cDAC #106358
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix evaluate method in a struct that doesn't need extra_space #106351
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Enable `ConditionalSelect_FalseOp` scenario for first-faulting tests #106349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Flight new nuget code in a new SDK #106348
    needs-area-label
  • add PACKAGE.md for System.Formats.Nrbf #106344
    documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106341
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add DiagnosticSource to CheckNonEventSourcesRunning #106337
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add more images to table #106336
    needs-area-label
  • Skip deeply-recursive test in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` if doing random OSR #106335
    needs-area-label
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0
  • Update to Preview7 SDK #106333
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a couple commutative flags to be correct #106332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [.NET 10] Use ProjectReferences in libs #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM-SVE: Add LD/ST info to SVE instructions #105512 #106328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update packaging.targets #106327
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable HuffmanDecoding_ValidEncoding_Succeeds on Browser #106326
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Provide Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests package readme #106317
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix: SafeBerHandle and HGlobalMemHandle leaks in BerConverter #106316
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Sign/zero-extend small primitive arguments for pinvokes on arm32 and Apple arm64 #106314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Sign/zero-extend small primitive arguments on arm32 and Apple arm64 #106312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #106309
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Modify dwarfReg in native llvm-libunwind to be consistent with the LoongArch manual. #106308
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add FreeBSD as valid test host. #106302
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • ARM64-SVE: Emit `AddSequentialAcross` correctly #106292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Provide Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package readme #106273
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Push MemoryMarshal down to System.Runtime #106360
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #106356
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #106357
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Remove two outdated test inputs from regex match timeout tests #106174
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Implement type name resolution for ILLink analyzer" #106343
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix: SettingsProperty constructor ignores serializeAs parameter if it is not SettingsSerializeAs.Binary #106295
    area-System.Configuration
  • Workaround EventSource counters race condition in networking tests #106294
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Report exports as control flow guard targets #106320
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make the TimeProvider timer test reliable #106303
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #106353
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #105117
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Update System.Formats.Asn1.csproj #106324
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Fix logging formatting #106283
    area-Extensions-Logging, 9.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #106300
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #106301
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Implementation of SOSDacApi GetMethodDescName for cDAC #106169
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make acquiring the loader module for a FnPtrTypeDesc a simple operation instead of a complex algorithm #106299
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix alignment of local vars #106313
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Avoid clearing morphed flag in `gtSetEvalOrder` #106286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix x86 VectorT_ToScalar(long) when SSE41 not available #106296
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates #102904 #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • [test] Remove flaky GC regression test #106276
    test-failure, disabled-test, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add area ownership for System.ClientModel #106281
    area-Meta
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add `DelayLoadHelperWithExistingIndirectionCell`. #106304
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers. #106252
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64

    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [HttpClientFactory] Don't log header values by default #106271
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory

    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump requirement for QUIC async cert validation to MsQuic 2.4 #106251
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Added all missing xml docs for Tensors #106084
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix passing targetRID into sourcebuild job #106285
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][llvm] Fix handling of compare when last instruction in bblock #106233
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Ensure that aggregation is consistent regardless of data alignment #106166
    area-System.Numerics
  • DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Simplify MethodDesc::GetLoaderModule #106212
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0

    area-VM-coreclr

  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317

  • Creating new TypeName without reparsing + usage in NRBF #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration
  • Reenable more_tailcalls under GCStress #106287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • fix #105969 #106218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add missing xml docs for System.Numerics #106290
    area-System.Numerics
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr

  • Fix EventListenerThreadPool test #105895
    area-Tracing-coreclr

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #106013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • GC cleanup from #94175 #105517
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use .alt_entry/.private_extern on Apple platforms #106224
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement BinaryReader.ReadExactly #106238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0

    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution

    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimize codegen for atomics #2448

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix missing helper info for `CORINFO_UNBOX_TYPETEST` #2659
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Integrate TypeSpec into TypeDecls and ABI parsing. #2650
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Migrate the last LLVM helper to WASM and delete `LLVMObjectWriter` #2655
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug]: ProjectReference.ExcludeAssets ignored for transitive dependencies #42708
  • Align the wording on `dotnet workload config --update-mode` to not mention 'install mode' #42692

Closed

  • System.Text.Json 8.0.4 is not added in the parent library like azure.identity and etc #42294
  • Workload Install Type Can be Incorrect with Manifests Authored for Younger SDKs #39275
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload Sets] With manifest mode and workload installed, Unhandled exception occurs when running `dotnet workload --info` using global.json #42581
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #42637
  • `build.cmd` should have a flag like `-s` or `--sdk-only` to skip installer build #42627
  • Daily build: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 6.0.34) #42638
  • With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 8.0.400-baseline.24372.6 was not found.." displayed when installing Maui workload in CLI. #42357

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update OmniSharp version used by source build tests #42707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #42703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #42700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #42698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Try out new NuGet dependency resolver #42682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove auditSources section #42706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #42702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include LA64 in supported ILCompiler RIDs #42657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix bug in workload history recorder #42536
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix feature band when assigning a workload to a workload install type #42566
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Always print manifest versions in workload list command #42653
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #42630
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2513776 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Support globbing filter for dotnet test #42670
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42666
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42665
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42664
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42656
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42655
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Describe span ambiguities due to type inference #8358

Merged

  • Field-backed properties: add open questions #8359
  • Describe more span breaking changes #8353

Updated

  • Specify nullability analysis of field-backed properties #8346

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegisterHostOutputs #74753
  • Use the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package for the System.Index/System.Range implementation downlevel #74752
  • API: `Conversion.IsSpan` #74738
  • Source Generators and Analyzers extensibility #74737
  • "IDE0018 Variable declaration can be inlined" missing in top-level statements #74736
    Backlog
  • Params collection in collection expression's .Add method causes crash by StackOverflow #74734
  • Params collection as AppendLiteral parameter causes crash #74733

Closed

  • Support attributes in SymbolDisplayParameterOptions #74742

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable build on test refresh #74751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Use existing property to access services #74749
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge "first-class Span types" feature into main #74732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add `Conversion.IsSpan` public API #74731
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Expose document symbols to Razor cohosting #74730
    VSCode
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to primary constructor #74748
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix some small things with readme #74709
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Send a TextDocumentidentifier for razor dynamic file requests/responses #74727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Avoid async void methods #74744
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch API to immutable-array from params-array #74741
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix URI comparisons for different casing #74746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove implicit unsafe cast in foreach #74747
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unnecessary type for wrapping analyzer references. #74739
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Some minor renames/cleanup before an upcoming large refactoring #74743
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rename file and wrap long parameter list #74735
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Modify MergedNamespaceDeclaration.MakeChildren to to allocate less #74698
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add span type inference #74646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Add support in DevKit for source link go to definition #74626
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CODE_STYLE workarounds #74697
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Authroization policy evaluation should not implictly require authentication scheme. #57322
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #57321
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38168 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #57317
  • Unexpected BLAZOR106 error when adding static script files to razor pages project #57324
  • .NET 8 Issue. Method 'get_ServerSideSessions' in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer.ApiAuthorizationDbContext`1' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer, Version=7.0.20.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation. #57310
  • OpenAPI operations include parameters disallowed by OpenAPI 3.0 specification #57305
  • [Blazor] Update service worker to support fingerprinting #57302
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #57300

Closed

  • Add a new parameter to the ImportMap component that allows to specify a Nonce for the importmap html script #57277
  • WebSocket keep-alive timeout API #57072
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor SSR Navigate does not work inside try/catch block #57311
  • Blazor WASM: OnDragEnd EventCallback throws an exception on latest Firefox, worked fine previously #57309
  • Publishing Blazor WASM failing with Integrity checks #38552
    9.0.0
  • Append Hashes To Blazor Published Files #47575
    9.0.0
  • Move integrity support to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor WebAssembly SDK #47000
    9.0.0
  • Can the Dictionary when TryGetValue false support set the default value or Fun/Action to return? #57301
  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes, json_middleware #57267
  • Perf improvement: https #57276
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57291

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove LINQ usage for IEnumerable comparisons #57323
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/2.1] Update Wix to 3.14.1 #57320
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • Grammatical error in ChangeEventArgs.cs #57299
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Benchmark.DotNet dependency #57297
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Log registered IApiDescriptionProvider implementations on load #57318
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix exit AcceptLoop in Http.Sys #57319
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #57316
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.34
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #57315
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.9
  • Add KeepAliveTimeout support to WebSocketMiddleware #57293
    feature-websockets, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] ImportMap fixes #57282
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • Address flaky hosting event counters tests #57269
    area-hosting, 9.0-rc1
  • Avoid OrderedIterator when comparing OpenApiSchema.Required equality #57298
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1
  • Localize transformers list and throw from type-based transformers #57296
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add hpack decoding test #57221
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Slow Collectionview Rendering performance in Maui compared to Xamarin #24224
  • [Android] Dynamically loading an assembly results in BadImageFormatException #24221
  • Hot Reload setting a Dynamic Resource does not make it Dynamic #24218
  • SystemResources depends on DependencyService #24216
  • [Windows] IconImageSource as StreamImageSource of ContentPage in TabbedPage doesn't display #24214
  • "No C# compiler has been specified" trying to compile iOS Bindings library #24210
  • NavigationPage does not close reliably #24204
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24203
    9.0-rc1
  • Adding many styles causes a MAUI app to crash on launch #24193

Closed

  • The ScrollTo method does not carry the element in a grouping #8718
    .NET 8 SR9
  • About MAUI appicon and splash not updating on iOS device #24159
  • Theming android native timepicker popup #24092
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CollectionView GridItemsLayout Shows 6 Columns Even When Span is Set to 7, When Display Scale is Set to 125% or 150% #23684
  • [regression/8.0.3] Shell.NavBarIsVisible is not working on iOS #18948
    Backlog
  • [Windows] MauiWinUIWindow leak #24102
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Testing] Fix EnsureSupportForCustomWebViewClients #24146
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Maui Frame - Shadow on Frame not working on Maui #24168
  • MAUI create a pdf same as content page #24174
  • Windows does not raise Tapped event while Android does. #24175
  • .Net Maui c# Android MainPage.xaml.cs Can't access Methods from Button call #24180
  • .net MAUI Blazor App Lambda expressions in @for loop capturing incorrect index value #24181
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error (active) CS0104 'Permissions' is an ambiguous reference between 'Microsoft.Maui.Ap #24183
  • MAUI Permission for Write Storage is always Denied in Android #24173
  • How to enable auto-update for Microsoft, Apple and Android Store published .MAUI Blazor App? #24172
  • IOS and ANDROID status bar cannot change color #24177
  • DependencyInjetion fires together with maui Exceptions #24184
  • MAUI XAML errors about ContentPage (and others) not found #24188
  • Issue with updating to Microsoft.Identity.Client v4.61.0 #24189
  • Unable to upgrade nuget package Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility 8.0.14 to 8.0.7 #24190
  • App crashes when returning to app from background [main/xamarin_main/monotouch-main/etc.) #23682
  • Button VerticalOptions behaviour different between Android and iOS when in a Grid #24192

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] call `PlatformContentViewGroup.postInvalidate()` less #24222
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [ci] Use passwordless auth for darc/maestro #24220
    area-infrastructure
  • Add some defensive code around layout propagation #24217
  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24209
    community ✨
  • Fix 899474 #24207
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • Defining CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the app #24205
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for CornerRadius of GradientDrawable for ImageButton #24200
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SearchBar presentation taken whole screen size in horizontal screen orientation #24198
    community ✨
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24197
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨

Merged

  • Blazor Hybrid Template Remove reference to removed styling #24199
    area-templates
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale
  • Add xUnit types to avoid first-chance exceptions in tests #24130
    area-testing
  • [Accessibility] Make flyout titles on iOS read as buttons #24018
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/a11y
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area-xaml, area-controls-shell
  • [net8.0] Update macios to latest stable release #24155
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak w/ main window #24176
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦

    area-testing

Updated

  • Fix cake scripts to work locally #24111
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixed low quality images in Resizetizer #23924
    area-single-project, community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark and enable verbose Glide logging #24033
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476

  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065

  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create a docs link for Migrations locking #34428
  • SQL Server: Allow switching to the new JSON type by default #34416
    Backlog
  • SQL Server: Reference .NET 9.0 SqlDbType.Json instead of (SqlDbType)35 #34414
    Backlog

Closed

  • EF.IsDesignTime not set in efcore bundle context #33445
    9.0.0
  • Translate the new LINQ Order/OrderDescending #28634
    9.0.0
  • Add-Migration failing with new Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces v4.10.0 #33970
  • Contains to OPENJSON translation regresses performance #32394
    9.0.0
  • Enable EF.Parameter for forcing parameterization of collection parameters #34345
    9.0.0
  • Introduce context options to control constantization/parameterization of parameterized collections #34344
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing Model Builder API #34427
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #34426
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34425
  • thoughts on caching argumentsPropagateNullability arrays? #34422
  • better perf in SupportedMethods calculation in SqlServerConvertTransl… #34421
  • remove repeated IsGenericMethod and GetGenericMethodDefinition in SqlServerByteArrayMethodTranslator #34419
  • use switch for SqlServerDateOnlyMemberTranslator #34417
  • Don't generate code for precached values in the compiled model by default #34412

Merged

  • use GetValueOrDefault and Remove #34423
  • use collection expressions in SqlServerByteArrayMethodTranslator #34420
  • remove redundant (SqlExpression) cast in SqlServerByteArrayMethodTranslator #34418
  • Translate Order & OrderDescending #34282
  • Context options to control constantization/parameterization of parameterized collections and EF.Parameter improvement collection parameters #34406
  • API review changes from August 12 #34415

Updated

  • Remove migration lock timeout #34338
  • Experimental support for the Azure SQL JSON type #34401
